slides.alt: Three gala apples arranged on a white background
Top down view of white bowl full of sprouts. The bowl is on a folded, light checked tea towel with a metal teaspoon placed diagonally next to it on a white wood surface
Two slices of gouda in red wax sat on a wooden table
Spaghetti topped with lardons, grated parmesan and pepper on a white oval place set on wood
Carrot cake topped with frosting and walnuts with a slice taken out sat on a white cake stand. Below the stand is a knife with frosting on it
Two bowls of butternut squash risotto topped with small sage leaves. Each bowl has a fork in it and the bowls are sat on a marble surface
